title: Was there corporal punishment in your school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes there most certainly was! The teachers paddled, the principal paddled too! The teachers often did it in front of the class, while bending over the desk or a chair so the whole class watched. This was a tactic known as “embarrassment” which is a good part of discipline. If you were lucky and didn’t get paddled in front of the class, you had to stay after or come at the end of the day to receive your punishment. The good part was that the whole class did not witness it, however; the bad part was that since it was one on one/teacher student, it meant you were pulling down your pants and getting it on your underwear. No big deal, because they didn’t see your bare butt. It just hurt more, which was the reason for dropping the pants! The principal also paddled on the underwear as well, since neither the teacher or principal was allowed to punish the students on the bare butt. The only exception was if the parent specifically requested or suggested that their son/daughter receive the paddling on the bare butt. It happened to me once by the principal. I had to drop my pants & underwear both, and bend over the desk and received several swats with the paddle on my BARE BUTT by my female principal. I also received a paddling again at home because of it, again on my bare butt. The gym teacher and coach DID however get away with making the boys only get paddled on the bare butt quite often. It happened to me a few times, alone and in front of others. The only other time I had to pull down pants & underwear to receive a bare butt paddling at school, was in junior high school when I was 14. I had been paddled before a few times and was on the verge of being suspended for 3–5 days! My principal told me that if I were his son, I would get it like he gets it at home- good & hard on my bare ass! I told him I received all my punishment by paddle and belt on the bare butt. I asked him if we could make a deal and if he agreed to NOT suspend me and further, NOT tell my parents about any of this; then I would agree to a paddling on my bare butt right now and he he could give me as many as he felt necessary. I was surprised, but he agreed and was also impressed by me. He wasted no time and took the paddle from the drawer, locked the door and I proceeded to gladly pull down my pants and underwear to my ankles; bend over his desk and received my 12 swats with the paddle. When done, I stood up with my pants & underwear still down and faced him; shook his hand and thanked him, then pulled up my underwear & pants and called it a day. He was always so impressed with how I asked for and took the punishment that day, as a mature man at age 14!

My first year of teaching was in 1957. I was teaching fifth grade in Roswell, New Mexico. Spanking students was allowed, almost encouraged. Also, I had been taught almost nothing about maintaining discipline in the classroom. One of the rules was no chewing gum. I’d said “If I see it, hear it, or smell it it must go.” This had little effect. So I added “If you’re caught with gum you’ll get three swats with the paddle.” In that class was a delightful young lady who happened to attend the same church we did. Not long after making this ridiculous threat, I noticed that she was chomping gum in a very visible way. And I wasn’t the only one who had noticed. Several students had. Oh, boy. I invited her, after getting rid of her gum, to step out into the hall with me. She bent over and I gave her three very gentle swats with the paddle. Fortunately for both of us, (1957?) she was wearing a full skirt and several petticoats. If she felt anything at all, it was probably something like a breeze. After that I withdrew my threat and never spanked another student. Welcome to the twentieth century.
